languages.text: {n}Зардевшись, юноша вскидывает подбородок.{/n} "Род Зауэрбэков стоек в вере, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Зардевшись, юноша вскидывает подбородок.{/n} "Род Зауэрбеков стоек в вере, Ваша милость!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは照れて赤面し、あごを上げる。{/n}「ザウアーバック家はどこまでも忠誠をお誓い申し上げます、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは照れて赤面し、あごを上げる。{/n}「ザウアーバック家はどこまでも忠誠をお誓い申し上げます、陛下！」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克涨红了脸，扬起了下巴。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族的信仰绝不动摇，大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克涨红了脸，扬起了下巴。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族的信仰绝不动摇，大人！”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback se sonroja y levanta la cara.{/n} «¡La fe de la casa Sauerback es firme, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback se sonroja y levanta la cara.{/n} «¡La fe de la casa Sauerback es firme, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: {n}Sauerback s'empourpre et lève le menton.{/n} « La foi de la maison Sauerback est inébranlable, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback s'empourpre et lève le menton.{/n} « La foi de la maison Sauerback est inébranlable, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback errötet und hebt das Kinn an.{/n} "Das Haus Sauerback ist unerschütterlich in seinem Glauben, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback blushes and raises his chin.{/n} "House Sauerback is stalwart in its faith, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback errötet und hebt das Kinn an.{/n} "Das Haus Sauerback ist unerschütterlich in seinem Glauben, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor, başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi, imanından dönmez {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
